events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want a refund immediately because this is really disappointing.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving the wrong product.
Assigning the case to a customer service agent specializing in refund requests to handle the complaint.
Hello, I understand your concern about the incorrect item and Iâ€™m here to help you resolve this promptly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I have attached a clear photo of the wrong item delivered.
Thank you for the information; I have initiated a full refund which should be returned to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund process, I appreciate your help resolving this issue efficiently.
The refund case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance regarding this order.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting support.
